name: Ghirardelli® Soda Fountain and Chocolate Shop
location: Disney California Adventure Park, San Fransokyo Square

items.title: World Famous Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Vanilla ice cream and handmade hot fudge topped with whipped cream, diced almonds, a cherry, and a Milk Chocolate Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Magical Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Vanilla ice cream and handmade hot fudge topped with whipped cream, sprinkles, and dipped waffle ears.

items.title: Ocean Beach Sea Salt Caramel Sundae
items.description: Caramel sauce, vanilla ice cream, handmade milk or dark chocolate hot fudge topped with whipped cream, sea salt, and a Milk or Dark Sea Salt Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Chocolate Lover's Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Chocolate ice cream layered with handmade hot fudge, topped with whipped cream, mini dark chocolate chips, chocolate sauce, and a Milk Chocolate SQUARE.

items.title: Gold Rush Caramel Almond Sundae
items.description: Caramel sauce, vanilla ice cream, sea salt, and diced almonds topped with whipped cream and a White Chocolate Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Mint Bliss Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Mint chocolate chip and chocolate ice cream, layered with handmade dark chocolate hot fudge and topped with whipped cream and a Dark Chocolate Mint SQUARE.

items.title: Strawberry Passion Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Strawberry and vanilla ice cream, sweetened strawberries, and handmade hot fudge topped with whipped cream and a dipped strawberry.

items.title: Non-Dairy Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Hot fudge made with non-dairy chocolate chips and almond milk over scoops of non-dairy vanilla coconut and finished with almond milk whipped topping, diced almonds, a cherry, and a 72% Dark Chocolate SQUARE.

items.title: Cookie Crumble Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Vanilla, cookie dough, and cookies ‘n cream ice cream, handmade hot fudge, whipped cream, chocolate chip cookie crumbles, and two Milk Chocolate Caramel MINIS.

items.title: Lands End Salted Caramel Brownie Sundae
items.description: A full-size chocolate brownie, caramel sauce, sea salt, vanilla ice cream, and handmade hot fudge topped with whipped cream, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and a cherry.

items.title: Golden Gate Banana Split
items.description: Vanilla, strawberry, and chocolate ice cream topped with crushed pineapple, sweetened strawberries and handmade hot fudge served with a banana, whipped cream, diced almonds, and a cherry.

items.title: Waffle Bowl Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Our world famous hot fudge sundae in a handmande dipped waffle bowl.

items.title: Treasure Island Warm Brownie Sundae
items.description: A warm chocolate brownie half, vanilla ice cream, and handmade hot fudge topped with whipped cream, diced almonds, and a cherry.

items.title: Waffle Cone Mini Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: Our Mini Hot Fudge Sundae in a handmade dipped waffle cone.

items.title: Mini Hot Fudge Sundae
items.description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream and handmade hot fudge topped with whipped cream, diced almonds, a cherry, and a Milk Chocolate Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Frozen Hot Cocoa
items.description: Hot cocoa mix blended with milk and ice, topped with whipped cream and mini dark chocolate chips.

items.title: Nob Hill Chill
items.description: Vanilla ice cream blended with milk, ice, and handmade hot fudge and topped with mini dark chocolate chips.

items.title: Caramel Quake Shake
items.description: A vanilla milkshake blended with three Milk Chocolate Caramel SQUARES, topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce.

items.title: Thick Shake - Small
items.description: Thick, cold, and creamy. Vanilla, Strawberry, or Chocolate Lover's.

items.title: Thick Shake - Medium
items.description: Thick, cold, and creamy. Vanilla, Strawberry, or Chocolate Lover's.

items.title: Thick Shake - Large
items.description: Thick, cold, and creamy. Vanilla, Strawberry, or Chocolate Lover's.

items.title: Classic Hot Cocoa - Small
items.description: A luxuriously deep chocolate flavor comes through in our hot cocoa topped with whipped cream and dusted with cocoa powder. Served with a Milk Chocolate Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Classic Hot Cocoa - Medium
items.description: A luxuriously deep chocolate flavor comes through in our hot cocoa topped with whipped cream and dusted with cocoa powder. Served with a Milk Chocolate Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Classic Hot Cocoa - Large
items.description: A luxuriously deep chocolate flavor comes through in our hot cocoa topped with whipped cream and dusted with cocoa powder. Served with a Milk Chocolate Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Sea Salt Caramel Hot Cocoa - Small
items.description: Our Classic Hot Cocoa but with the added creaminess of caramel, topped with whipped cream, sea salt, and caramel sauce. Served with a Dark Sea Salt Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Sea Salt Caramel Hot Cocoa - Medium
items.description: Our Classic Hot Cocoa but with the added creaminess of caramel, topped with whipped cream, sea salt, and caramel sauce. Served with a Dark Sea Salt Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Sea Salt Caramel Hot Cocoa - Large
items.description: Our Classic Hot Cocoa but with the added creaminess of caramel, topped with whipped cream, sea salt, and caramel sauce. Served with a Dark Sea Salt Caramel SQUARE.

items.title: Frozen Mocha - Medium
items.description: Chocolate frappé mix, chocolate sauce, espresso, and milk blended with ice topped with whipped cream and mini dark chocolate chips.

items.title: Frozen Mocha - Large
items.description: Chocolate frappé mix, chocolate sauce, espresso, and milk blended with ice topped with whipped cream and mini dark chocolate chips.

items.title: Frozen Vanilla Caramel Latte - Medium
items.description: Vanilla frappé mix, caramel sauce, espresso, and milk blended with ice topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce.

items.title: Frozen Vanilla Caramel Latte - Large
items.description: Vanilla frappé mix, caramel sauce, espresso, and milk blended with ice topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce.
